Reason: The configuration option 'row_cache_save_period' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'row_cache_save_period' directly affects the scheduling of cache saving operations in the 'initRowCache' method. The 'rowCache.scheduleSaving(DatabaseDescriptor.getRowCacheSavePeriod(), rowCacheKeysToSave);' line in the code snippet indicates that the value of 'row_cache_save_period' determines how frequently the row cache is saved, which can have a significant impact on system performance. Therefore, any changes to this configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
